text: The JAC Refine R3 is a compact Minivan made by JAC Motors from 2017 to 2023. == History and Features == The JAC Refine R3 was shown at the Guangzhou Auto Show in 2017. it has seven-seats and is positioned between the JAC Refine M2 and the JAC Refine M3 the minivan has a 1.6 liter petrol engine with a 5-speed manual or CVT. == Markets == The JAC Refine R3 was sold mainly in the Chinese market during its entire production run. == Discontinuation == The production of The JAC Refine R3 ended in 2023 and the minivan was discontinued without a sucessor. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Minivans
title: JAC Refine R3
